document.title: 2Fs and a C: What's your grade at Life University?
document.abstract: Failing, Finding, and capturing your vision... using a simple business plan. This presentation will teach the audience to think of plannig life after college as creating their own business. Audience members will create a "business" plan to map out a successul journey to their goals and raise the "grades" in their lives. Developing, growing and leading a business to success begins with a strong strong foundation- the same is required for for life.

field.name: location
field.value: Carolyn P. Brown Memorial University Center
